website_summaries.verdict: Even larger laptops can get protection, thanks to this 20" filter that shields private information up to a 45-degree angle.
pros: Can be used for both larger laptops and desktop monitors
Provides excellent glare reduction from the sun or office lighting
Protects sensitive data while at work, in public, or on planes
Monitor looks turned off unless looking at it straight on
cons: Cost is a bit high for some users
May have to turn the brightness all the way up or screen will be too dark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, wonderful for privacy.
customer_reviews.text: We use these screen protectors (we have bought 5 of them) at our office (healthcare) to protect our patient's information from prying eyes. They work really great, and are very easy to install (takes about 2-3 minutes). You can see the screen well when you are sitting straight on, but cannot see anything at all when viewing the monitor at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick very well.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how to rate this actually. Packing was great and Installation was easy. However, now I can see air marks like it didn’t stick on good but my main complaint is that with the protector the screen has lost touch screen functionality. I’m big on protection so I’ll leave it until I find another that works and grips better. Disappointed here.
customer_reviews.author: Dom G

customer_reviews.title: Totally opaque at small angle!
customer_reviews.text: Had to trim height which was surprisingly easy and neat. Lay screen on cardboard package, mark cut at edges using tape, align metal ruler and cut with razor knife using single pass. Used small tabs attached to film so i could remove. Very pleased. Recommend matte side versus glossy.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to Complain About
customer_reviews.text: This does what it is supposed to do. I found it very easy to install and I like that it is easily removable as I only need it on my computer for tests in school. I will say, the tabs are really only going to work well if you have a bezel screen so that the privacy screen can sit in it and the tabs can hold it in place. There is the tiniest sliver at the top of my screen that is uncovered but it is so small that it doesn't bother me, but I did measure my screen to be exactly the measurements given for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Moore

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive. Makes the screen darker but it does ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Pretty expensive. Makes the screen darker but it does make your screen private as you have to sit right in front of the screen to see the image. I wish there was a better method of attaching this. The things they provided are awful. I ended up using regular tape, which isnt ideal but works. Also I dont get why the product has a half moon cutout. The thing is very staticky and is a magnetic for dust and dirt
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dunn

customer_reviews.title: not a privacy screen
customer_reviews.text: i wouldn't call this a privacy screen. it is just a tinted film to put on your monitor screen. it only looks like your screen is turned off when you on on the very left or right of the screen. otherwise people can still still everything on your screen even if they are not directly in front of it. it is worse in dim light. the screen also does not come with clips so you have to tape it on. i recommend to spend the extra money on a better privacy screen.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: It installed easily and has held up well so far (about a ...
customer_reviews.text: It installed easily and has held up well so far (about a month). My only complaint is that the field of view is a little wider than I would prefer. Meaning that it doesn't provide as much privacy as other models. But I guess it's a "you get what you pay for" moment so I can't ding them much on that. It serves it's purposes in our office and even with a screen that wasn't an exact fit so it's overlapping the plastic outline you can hardly tell it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need it to.
customer_reviews.text: Fit just fine on my work laptop. It shields the screen from prying eyes on an airplane, in a lobby, etc. The only draw-back is that you really need to use the adhesive strips to keep it in place on the laptop screen (so that it doesn't fall out when carrying it closed). Just using the side-bar tabs won't hold it in securely. The adhesive doesn't alter the screen views, so it's really not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Regular

customer_reviews.title: do not remove the film cover unless you plan to minimize bubbles and plan for permanent privacy attachment
customer_reviews.text: The privacy filter fits the elitebook folio G1 perfect. However, instead of using the supplied strips to attach and reattach, it comes with a fully adhesive backing. This only allows the matte side view. The matte view isn't bad, but the tiny bubbles that exist all over the screen make white backgrounds unbearable for me. I chose to reattach the adhesive film cover and only use when needed utilizing the glossy side with slight imperfections from film cover reattach.
customer_reviews.author: Jones Analog

customer_reviews.title: Good filter but not so good anti-glare
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for anti-glare on my laptop screen. My Acer Extensa 5630-4250 has a shiny LDC screen. With black background, it can be used as a mirror. So I needed an anti-glare filter. In that purpose, Targus Privacy Filter is not a good product. It still glares a lot with a little light on your back, even from the light on the ceiling. However, this product is sold as a privacry filter. In that sense, it serves pretty well. It darkens your screen a little but from off angle, it hides very well. If you are looking for Privacy Filter, go for it. If you want an anti-glare, find something cheaper and better one.
customer_reviews.author: YONGBOK GO

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great, No Privacy
customer_reviews.text: We have 21.5" screens, and the 21.5" version of this fits very nicely in it and the sticky tabs work great. But as for the privacy filters themselves, they hardly black out the screen at all. You have to be standing on the very side of the screen for these to work. If you're in front of the screen at all, regardless of distance, you can easily see what's going.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to apply on my laptop and works good.I had to increase the brightness however
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Makes the screen too dark
customer_reviews.text: This privacy filter just doesnt do a very good job. When installed you can still see the screen from most angles, especially at a distance. Further, it makes the screen so dim that its difficult to do anything without straining your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: lkim

customer_reviews.title: VERY SECURE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item and I will purchase again as needed! Very satisfied Prime Customer!!!! Janie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly easy to figure out how to install since it did not come with directions. I finally just stuck it to the computer with the tabs which were included. Totally cuts down glare which is what I needed since I work in front of a computer all day. I would give it 1 star for installation ease but gave it 4 stars for getting rid of all glare.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Tuohy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit all monitors
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a privacy screen for a Samsung SyncMaster S22A460 and this one came up as compatable. It is not. It is a 16 X 10 ratio and I believe that the Samsung is 16 x 9, which left it about half an inch too tall. Fortunately, I could swap the monitor for a Dell E2210 which fits almost perfectly. You can attach it three ways (tabs on the bezel, tabs in the bezen and directly to the screen). It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Percard

customer_reviews.title: REALLY HELPS WITH COMPUTER'S GLARE
customer_reviews.text: This screen is worth every penny! I have photo sensitive eyes and the glare of my computer's screen without it was really bothering them. It is very light weight, but high quality. The only problem is that you need to tape it to the frame around the screen, but it does fit a 24" screen beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Brookview Girl

customer_reviews.text: didn't do what I wanted it to do. I wanted only ME to see my computer screen at work and NOT everyone else walking down near my cube or my BOSS that sits right aside of me! I will try a different kind to see if it was just this particular model ?! I have seen these screens block out EVERY direction except the user, so I will keep trying. (it did fit my screen perfect)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Martino

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I cringed at the cost of this privacy screen but the quality is really good and the magnetic attachment feature is awesome for quick removal and replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The screen has a noticeably large reverse tab in the top right that isn't shown in the image. I assume it is there to allow you to remove the screen, but it looks ridiculous. In addition, it doesn't quite fit the screen that I'm using. This isn't a very useful product.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonQDixon

customer_reviews.title: Order One Inch larger than your actual screen Size!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product does darken your screen and give privacy, but be warned order one inch larger than the actual size of your screen. I ordered a 22 inch privacy screen. I have light coming though on each side of the cover. Overall, it works but I do wish that I would have ordered a 23 or 24 inch privacy filter instead of a 22 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Face

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I chose to use the sticky tabs to install this filter on my screen with the tabs around the edges rather than on the screen itself so I can slide the screen in and out for cleaning. It's wonderful! You can see if you're directly beside or behind at just the right angle, but it does make it more difficult to do so and keeps prying eyes from seeing everything they shouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: SKN

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase-
customer_reviews.text: This product uses stripes of double stick tape to hold the privacy screen in place. Not as illustrated and not useful at all.
customer_reviews.author: El Ron

customer_reviews.title: May take some trimming
customer_reviews.text: Unit works as proclaimed. Measure your size very carefully as it didn't quite fit my laptop... too tall by 1/4" and not wide enough by 1/2". Laptop manufacturers tend to round up their numbers. Trimmed with a paper trimmer to sit flush on the screen and used the smaller plastic tabs to hold it in. Screen is a fingerprint magnet so wear gloves when installing.
customer_reviews.author: The Great Gazoo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent privacy filtering
customer_reviews.text: Received two privacy screens for office computers very quickly, very well packaged. They work very well and provide excellent security. They are a little tricky to adhere to the monitor securely, but I just used a piece of a post-it note in one corner to hold it in place. They are very clear from straight-on viewing, but they do appear to have diagonal lines unless you are directly in front. Overall, they are excellent quality for a reasonable price. Compared to Office Max at $90 a piece, you really can't complain about the quality or value.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten one sooner
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I finally bought one of these. I get terrible headaches because I work on the computer all day long. I had been contemplating purchasing one but I took my time comparing prices. I attached it to my monitor as soon as it arrived. No more headaches and my eyes feel so much better now.
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The screen fit my 13 inch 2016 MacBook Pro with the touch bar perfectly. The magnetism is perfect, and keeps the screen snug, but not so hard that it is difficult to remove. You do have to put the brightness all the way up, even when you're looking straight on, to get the full effect of the retina display. All around, a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Zakato 70

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to install and works really well as a privacy ...
customer_reviews.text: Screen Fits my HP Elite X2 perfectly. Really easy to install and works really well as a privacy screen. I would highly recommend this to others concerned with the privacy of their tablet.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. Tharp

customer_reviews.title: Not the best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that for the amount of money this filter costs, it doesn't filter very much. People cannot read from the side, which is great, but I seldom have people standing at my side. My back is to the door, facing my computer, so when people come in the first thing they can see is what's on my screen -- and this filter does not block from across my desk. That's what I wanted. On the plus side, it does keep the glare down from the fluorescent lighting above my head and the sunlight streaming in through the uncovered window.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Find that the screen adhesive does not stay on and ...
customer_reviews.text: Find that the screen adhesive does not stay on and the privacy screen moves down a lot. Not using at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Works great! One complaint is that the only way to attach the screen to my laptop was with the adhesive strips, which are visible and kind of unsightly. Does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: bdette

customer_reviews.title: wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it dose not fit a true 15 inch wide screen
customer_reviews.author: Darrold Stiehl

customer_reviews.title: Great for medical offices where patient confidentiality is important
customer_reviews.text: Even my tech person loves this screen - it adheres to the computer without any "fixtures" and obscures the screen unless a person is standing right in front of it. Great for medical offices where patient confidentiality is important.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: No quality control
customer_reviews.text: Missing pieces. It was a gift to a friend working abroad. It cost more for me to ship it then I bought it for. The only way to get the correct pieces is to get it back and then return it to amazon. I'll have paid for it 4 times over of I were to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Sudzy 1

customer_reviews.title: Mind Yours
customer_reviews.text: This screen allows people to mind their business and not yours. I Love it. It is especially good if you are using your computer on the plane or in a public place and you have some confidental information that the people sitting next to you don't need to see. I will keep one of these on every portable computer I have.
customer_reviews.author: O. Bell

customer_reviews.title: I also loved the privacy it gives me when people come from ...
customer_reviews.text: This screen helped me greatly from the glare of the lights in my office. I also loved the privacy it gives me when people come from any side of my screen you are not able to see for a long distance. Happy customer :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product but is not the superior privacy screen. Kensington’s is better.
customer_reviews.text: Solid privacy screen but honestly I purchased it simply as a screen protector. While the Targus is very good, I feel like the Kensington privacy is better because it covers more of my Macbook Pro 15” and it has better magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Lim

customer_reviews.title: There were only 3 under-bezel Tabs in my package. ...
customer_reviews.text: There were only 3 under-bezel Tabs in my package. However, The installation guide claims there are 6. I expect the screen come with a box. However, it did not. This is my first privacy screen. As the other reviews mentioned, it did not filter very much. Only people from a specific angle can be blocked. is it normal a situation?
customer_reviews.author: huilien

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and is the perfect fit for my MacBook Air laptop! Love it! (Yes. You do have to be looking directly at the screen to see with this filter installed. YEAH! No more shoulder surfers reading confidential information. :-) )
customer_reviews.author: PVC

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This was a different model than I was looking for ASF238W9USZ -60 was looking for -70 which is a better privacy screen.
customer_reviews.author: Megatron001

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible lines on the screen. See picture. I already removed protection film from both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Only partial privacy
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as some in that you can still see the screen from around a 45 degree angle. Have co-workers who have these that go black much better unless looking from close to straight on.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Browse in privacy..
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for my office. I love that the package also provides various sized sticky tabs with instructions on different ways you can attach it to the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but not as good quality as the 3Ms. Of course the 3Ms costs more. Just make sure of your measurements before purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dad75

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does as described, but size is a little smaller than our ASUS 27" screen, but not enough to return item. Good product for the price, albeit undersized.
customer_reviews.author: Don H

customer_reviews.title: Good privacy screen
customer_reviews.text: it does what it needs to do: doesn't let people stare at my laptop when I am checking my email or other private information. I wish it was a tad more darker, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing experience
customer_reviews.text: Follow-Up: This item was returned (postage paid by Triplenet.com) for a full refund. Thank you. They requested that I remove my feedback, however, I am just updating and changing my rating from 1 star to 3 stars on their behalf. This experience was not a pleasant one. For the price paid (over $60) I recieved a piece of damaged plastic. It was more of a hassel to have returned it,so I just chalked it up to a bad purchase and a bad choice on my part. HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED! Probably won't do this again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dzierzewski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Planar 24" Monitors
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for Planar 24" Monitors. No trimming needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does next to nothing for privacy.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as advertised. It reduces glare but does next to nothing for privacy. I can sit in the cube diagonally across from me and still see my screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley F

customer_reviews.title: Great privacy screen
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect. I ordered it because I do payroll and banking for my business. This provides privacy and additional time for me to minimize sensitive information, if needed. There was a small half moon cut out on one edge. Not sure if that was intended or a defect. I may call customer service to inquire. Otherwise, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's onlyh good for people sitting next to you
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to be able so no one can view my screen from walking up behind me, but you can. It's onlyh good for people sitting next to you. Glad I was able to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Katrinka H.

customer_reviews.title: return. You have a problem you'll get no help
customer_reviews.text: Needed to return a product they won't reply so you stuck with their junk.
customer_reviews.author: Donna White

customer_reviews.title: Not very private..
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what this screen is good for but it doesnt help with privacy. I can see whats on the screen from across the room. I first noticed this when someone complimented the background picture when they sitting to my left.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Tabs were useless
customer_reviews.text: The tabs came off in a day or two. There were extra so I put those on and same thing. Completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Aich

customer_reviews.title: Snaps on like, well, a snap
customer_reviews.text: Like: snap on easily and holds tight to the screen Dislike: Personally I’d prefer the viewing angle to be a little narrower
customer_reviews.author: macchelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my screen bcause I run a small tax office. I want to be sure no one was able to read over my shoulder and to keep the customers business private. I recommend this product to others that need this type of privacy while working.
customer_reviews.author: ALFONSO FERGUSON SR.

customer_reviews.title: Works good but it does not cover 100% of screen
customer_reviews.text: Works good but it does not cover 100% of screen. I have the size monitor it was supposed to fit.
customer_reviews.author: TJG

customer_reviews.title: It's allright
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with this however I wish there was more privacy- the angle of its privacy is kinda limited. Overall its good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall OK, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product but I don't particularly like one of the ways of holding it onto your computer. I have a laptop and the little plastic tabs that they give you, along with tape-like strips, are really annoying. First off, the ones that go on the bottom of the screen you kind of need to bend the plastic so that it won't pop off the edging of the screen, but even then they pop off really easy. The privacy screen itself works really great, just the way to hold it on is not so good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Keiko Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected, works exactly as described. The screen is very useful in keeping eyes from seeing items on the monitor unless from viewing straight on.
customer_reviews.author: AMarie

customer_reviews.title: Bought cheaper ones and there is a big difference.
customer_reviews.text: Bought cheaper ones and there is a big difference. Sometimes saving money now only leads to more spending later
customer_reviews.author: Allan M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor adhesion
customer_reviews.text: The Filter Screen has a poor adhesion and y very difficult pin up.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This privacy screen works as described, Viewing angle is 45 degrees from the center. It comes with some clear tabs to keep the screen from falling off, but it they don't feel that strong, it seems that the static it creates is good enough to keep the privacy screen to the laptop screen though. I use this screen with office laptop so it gives me the privacy I need from other co-workers. I paid 19.99 plus shipping (noticed the price went up)
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is a complete waste of money - I read the product reviews and chose to ignore them, in the past I have bought products that had bad reviews but turned out to be great products. However, this product does provides absolutely no privacy. BUYERS BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rastachick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for all the HP Compaq LA2205wg monitor's in my office. Easy fit, good angles, and less bulky than over the screen products. Removal tab could be placed more conveniently towards the corner rather than off center.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie T

customer_reviews.title: Privacy screen
customer_reviews.text: This fits my monitor perfectly. Gives me some privacy at work (not that I'm hiding anything).
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these screens if you are in need of privacy and glare reduction.
customer_reviews.text: Screens function as described providing privacy and reducing glare. Screens were very easy to attach to monitors and have had no problem with them falling off.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: It does the basic job, but not too the degree I've seen on others computers. It's not dark enough
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Dust
customer_reviews.text: It became dusty between the screen and the privacy filter. I was also told that the dust would eventually lead to scratches on the tablet's screen. I will not be recommending this product to other field personnel.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Catalano

customer_reviews.title: Good do more
customer_reviews.text: I expected more view cutoff when looked at from the side.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It worked well as expected for the reason I bought it. Just make sure that it lies flat against the screen, no gaps, no leaning away.
customer_reviews.author: Boogt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I expected. Does not stay in place on monitor as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: View dimmed at sides
customer_reviews.text: Because of the width, if you focus on the center of the screen, the left and right sides of the screen views are dim (in the state of a little partially blocked). Also, my purpose to purchase this screen is for anti-glare filter. It does not do a good job on this function. Its anti-glare function is worse than those filters not designed for any-spy.
customer_reviews.author: Heng Sun

customer_reviews.title: does just what it should
customer_reviews.text: This works great and was easy to install. I provides privacy because you can only see when you are centered in front of it and it removes alot of glare.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good, but you need to get out pretty wide before the privacy goes into effect.
customer_reviews.author: $HP

customer_reviews.title: Marbled Appearance
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Does not “seal” cleanly. A lot of air bubbles give a marbled appearance that makes it hard to see through.
customer_reviews.author: CJF49

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for privacy and it works great. Most people think that I have my monitor ...
customer_reviews.text: This does the job. I bought it for privacy and it works great. Most people think that I have my monitor turned off. You can only see if you look strait on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was great
customer_reviews.text: Product was great and at a good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Get this instead of 3M's offering for 27" iMac.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly better than 3M's version of this product. Does not warp.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: To protect privacy while doing my work. Great product and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Green

customer_reviews.title: targus privacy filter
customer_reviews.text: privacy filter does what it says, blocks out unwanted viewing from other people, only minor issue is the adhesive tabs tend to come off if notebook left in trunk of car.
customer_reviews.author: The PC Manager, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great privacy screen
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for class. Best price i found.
customer_reviews.author: net

customer_reviews.title: Super screen filter
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. It fit perfect and keeps all my neighbors at work from seeing what I am doing and the price was way cheaper than I could find it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: lisa volpe

customer_reviews.title: The screen protector works amazing but the clips to add it to the computer ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector works amazing but the clips to add it to the computer are crap. I ended up buying some 3M clear reusable strip and they work like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: MyrieLo

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my monitor, so I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my monitor, so I had to cut off the edges and the top 1 to 1-1/2 inches of my screen is not covered. The mounting materials are fairly flimsy but by combining all of them the privacy screen mostly stays in place unless one of my co-workers opens the door too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: John McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome but the means of applying it suck. 3m has better ways to stick it to your screen.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: great item!
customer_reviews.text: great product...great price! fast shipping on a high quality product. I would recommend this to a friend. I will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: armand minghi

customer_reviews.title: A So-So Eye Protector.
customer_reviews.text: I doesn't really do much for eye protection while on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: didnt fill all the screen..had abt 2 mm space at top. text somewhat fuzzy but you can read monitor-privacy 7 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: didnt fill all the screen..had abt 2 mm space at top. text somewhat fuzzy but you can read monitor-privacy 7 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: VOLTRON

customer_reviews.title: No shoulder surfing anymore
customer_reviews.text: Works great, cant view from anywhere else but in front of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too dark and somewhat fuzzy looking for my likeness. Discarded on first day
customer_reviews.author: J. Boles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and they give you plenty of mounting tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: not much privacy, not enough antiglare
customer_reviews.text: This product is a minimalist in privacy and antiglare screening. It does darken the screen a little, but if you are by a window with lots of sun shining, get a better quality one. This would be fine for office cubes that are away from probing eyes or incoming sunlight so think before purchasing. This size was great and this did work with our budget so those were a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: Measure. measure measure but it works
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit my view sonic screen perfectly just a small sliver exposed but it works well and does the job. All others are much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SCtoLV

customer_reviews.title: Privacy Filter
customer_reviews.text: The privacy filter works very well in the application setting that we installed it in. People walking by cant see the screen
customer_reviews.author: J. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our office and it works beautifully - easy to install too. Seriously worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fluet

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The filter makes it difficult to see the screen. I only used it for a few days and then removed it.
customer_reviews.author: Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs better sticky tabs but the screen itself is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Roy C. Evans

customer_reviews.title: The users seem to be happy with these and it blocks the ability for people ...
customer_reviews.text: The users seem to be happy with these and it blocks the ability for people to look at sensitive information.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Heuston

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy using this with my laptop when I am in meetings or traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Targus ASF20W9USZ 20-Inch LCD Monitor Privacy Filter
product_meta.description: Style:20 inch Widescreen (16:9 Ratio)The 4Vu Privacy Screen is designed to fit 20” widescreen LCD monitors with 16:9 ratio screens. To protect your information, tiny vertical blinds on the surface of the privacy screen narrow the viewing angle so data is only visible directly in front of the monitor up to 30° away from the center of the screen. Onlookers will only see a dark unclear screen when attempting to view the information from a side angle. In addition to providing security, the screen also blocks the glare to help reduce eye strain. The 4Vu Privacy Screen can be easily attached by using clear adhesive strips designed for LCD filters or with the included tab guides that stick to the edge of the LCD bezel to hold the screen in place. Users can also position the tabs so the screen easily slides on and off. Highly portable and easy to use, the 4Vu Privacy Screen prevents onlookers from seeing valuable information often viewed on a LCD monitor.
feature_bullets: Protects private information with constrained viewing angles to 30° from either side
Filters Blue light, minimizing eye strain
Blocks screen glare for a comfortable viewing experience
The Targus 20" Privacy Filter is designed to fit 20" widescreen LCD monitors with 16:9 ratio screens
